feed.title: LF-Air
feed.subtitle: RSS feed based on RSS and LLM.

entry.title: Vite report on Sun, 28 Jan 2024 14:20:59
entry.summary: In recent news, Adept AI has introduced a new multimodal model called Fuyu-Heavy, which is specifically designed for digital agents. This model aims to enhance the capabilities of digital agents and improve their performance. Meanwhile, media literacy classes are gaining popularity, but some conservatives are expressing concerns about a perceived "woke" agenda associated with these classes. The debate surrounding media literacy education continues. Additionally, an individual shares their experience of creating a PalWorld server on AWS with a Discord bot in a two-part series. In another story, a former US Air Force officer has spent a significant amount of money, $11 million, in search of Amelia Earhart's long-lost plane and may have made a breakthrough in the search. Furthermore, a war simulation between China and Taiwan, assuming a potential return of Donald Trump to office in 2025, warns of dire consequences for Taiwan. Lastly, Garry Tan, a tech CEO and campaign donor, has faced criticism for expressing a wish for the death of San Francisco politicians.
